transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan ji Wasim Raja ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Boliye.
Customer: From W Raja Handloom Carpets.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Sir actually ek important discussion karna tha. Main business manager baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Haan. Main dekh raha hu sir ki aapne woh buylead reversal ke liye dala hua hai. Hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Toh aap yeh samjhiye sir dekhiye ho sakta hai pehle aapka jo bhi hua ho lekin hum kabhi bhi is tarike se sir hum is cheez ko promote nahi karte hain. Hamara koi bhi buylead jo hai woh is tarike se reverse nahi hota hai sir.
Customer: Kis tarike se?
Executive: Aapko mere khayal se hamari team ne bhi sir already bataya hoga.
Customer: Kis tarike se bataye sir mujhe woh cheez explain kariye pehle.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain sir?
Customer: Kis tarike se lead nahi process ho raha hai woh cheez mujhe samjhaiye pehle aap.
Executive: Sir lead jo aapke account mein aata hai sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: [inaudible] sahi hai.
Executive: Hmm. Jo lapse hui hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Right. Toh woh possible nahi hota hai sir. Aap yeh samjhiye na agar woh possible hota toh sir hum kyun mana karte aapko?
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Yeh cheez hai.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain sir?
Customer: Achcha yeh cheez hai jaise woh buylead jo chale gaye toh phir dobara nahi milenge.
Executive: Haan sir dekhiye aapka jo plan chal raha hai woh MDC services ka chal raha hai na?
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Ek second sir.
Executive: Aap hi Wasim Raja ji se baat ho rahi hai na? Aap hi use karte hain na services sir?
Customer: One second. Main use nahi karta jo secondary number hai woh use karte hain.
Executive: Kaun sir?
Customer: Secondary number jo hai 8171.
Executive: Secondary number ek second yeh jo number hai aapke number ke end mein 780 hai kya?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Achcha aur 604 pe.
Executive: Ek aur number hai jo yeh 87 se shuru ho raha hai 780 pe khatam ho raha hai. Isi number pe baat ho rahi hai na meri abhi?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Aur ek number hai jo 81 se shuru ho raha hai aur 604 pe khatam ho raha hai sir.
Customer: Haan us pe kar lijiye call.
Executive: Toh woh handle karte hain kya?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Actually sir hum kaafi time se koshish kar rahe hain unko connect karne ka unka number ya toh woh utha nahi rahe hain ya unka number mil nahi raha hai sir.
Customer: Bhai sir main kaam karna hi chhod diya main alag se apna kaam gaya tha woh handle karte hain unka handover kar diya main sab. Maine kitni baar bola maine number hata dijiye mujhe call mat kariye.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain sir?
Customer: Woh jo number hai unko priority dijiye mere pe call na kariye. Sir maine unko handover sab puch ke de diya apna kaam.
Customer: Woh handle karte hain.
Executive: Achcha. Lekin aapka naam toh Wasim Raja hai na sir?
Customer: Haan toh maine naam se register maine chalaya. Fir woh [unintelligible] ho gaya.
Executive: Achcha aap log partnership mein partnership mein chala rahe the kya aap log?
Customer: Haan mere saath hi mere bhai the woh ab unko de diya handover de diya maine unko kaam de diya karne ke liye jaiye aap kariye. Toh maine chhod diya main dusra kaam kar raha hu apna.
Executive: Achcha main isliye keh raha hu sir kyunki yahan par matlab naam aapka hi hai aur ek second jo GST hai.
Executive: Ek second sir.
Executive: GST pe naam hai Mohammad Nafees ji ka.
Customer: Haan wohi chalaiye ab unhi ko na call kariye.
Executive: Toh yeh Nafees ji hi chala rahe hain na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek second sir.
Customer: Ab mera number hata dijiye.
Executive: Sir yeh yeh wala jo number hai na 81 se shuru ho raha hai 604.
Customer: Unka number hai.
Executive: Yeh wala number pe keh rahe hain na aap? Haan mera number.
Customer: Haan mera number hata dijiye.
Executive: Yeh wala number mil hi nahi raha hai.
Customer: Wahi number pe baat karo mera number hata dijiye please request hai aapko.
Executive: Aur yeh jo email ID hai sir Nafees ke naam se hi hai email ID. Yeh toh unhi ka hoga na?
Customer: Haan. Hmm hmm.
Executive: Toh sir inka agar koi ek aur koi number ho sake sir jisse baat ho jaye.
Customer: Unhi se baat kariye wohi baat karenge wohi call uthayenge usi number pe baat hoga.
Executive: Achcha kis time pe rehte hain woh sir available?
Customer: Har time available mobile haath mein rehta hai woh baat kariye woh phone uthayenge.
Executive: Achcha kyunki isliye keh raha hu main kyunki shaam ka time ho raha hai na woh aisa na ho ki woh available na ho.
Customer: Nahi available sab time pe the aisa koi problem nahi.
Executive: Aur ek cheez aur bas confirm kar dijiye ek second.
Executive: Abhi jo last time sir baat hui thi Tausif ji se.
Customer: Nahi Tausif ji.
Executive: Se keh raha hu Nidhi ji se jo baat hui thi woh aap hi ki hui thi sir ya Nafees ji ki hui thi?
Customer: Mujhe nahi malum kya baat hui thi mere se baat hui toh maine bola mera number hata dijiye jo bhi call karta hai mera bol raha hu number hata dijiye mera number hata dijiye bas yahi baat karta hu sabse main aapse bhi yahi keh raha hu.
Executive: Sir actually hota kya hai na number jo bhi hatana hai na woh hum nahi hata sakte sir woh wohi hata sakte hain unhi ke haath mein hai.
Customer: Sir request aap hi karke force karke hatwa dijiye hatwa dijiye bas mujhe disturb na kariye.
Executive: Haan kyunki sir woh number bhi wohi hata sakte hain kyunki woh OTP wagera aata hai toh woh sari cheeze unhi ko karni padegi.
Customer: OTP aaye kuch bhi aaye sir mujhse le lijiye hum de denge usko hatwa dijiye aap kaise bhi karke hatwaiye ab mujhe disturb na kariye baar baar call karke. Maine kitni baar sabse bol diya maine chhod diya hu kaam karna mera number hata dijiye wohi chal raha hai yeh.
Executive: Toh aapne sir unko bola nahi yeh?
Customer: Bola hai sir kitni kaise bole jaise aapko request kar raha hu unko bhi bola hai. Ab kaise bolu?
Executive: Achcha. Theek hai sir main us number pe ek baar connect kar leta hu.
Customer: Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants his number to be removed.

- Customer is receiving unwanted calls.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the buylead reversal policy.

- Executive asked for the alternate contact number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with alternate number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- number removal, buyleads, gst, mdc
